sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { CommonModule } from "@angular/common"; import { RouterModule } from "@angular/router"; import { ProjectService } from "../../services/project.service"; import { Project } from "../../models/project.model"; @Component({ selector: "app-home", standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule], templateUrl: "./home.component.html", styleUrls: ["./home.component.css"], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { featuredProjects: Project[] = []; constructor(private projectService: ProjectService) {} ngOnInit() { this.featuredProjects = this.projectService.getFeaturedProjects(); } }

I discovered web development through my passion for creating dynamic, content-driven websites. Over the years, I've specialized in Umbraco CMS, becoming proficient in building custom solutions that meet complex business requirements.

My expertise lies in architecting complex Umbraco implementations, from building custom dealer websites with dynamic inventory management to executing large-scale platform migrations. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code while delivering solutions that exceed client expectations.

Currently, I’m working as a Full Stack .NET Developer at Professional Advantage Australia, where I contribute to the development and modernization of enterprise web platforms. I lead migration projects from legacy systems to Umbraco CMS, designing robust migration strategies, building custom automation tools to ensure data integrity, and minimizing downtime during transitions.

Backend

Umbraco C# .NET SQL Server Azure

Frontend

Angular.js JavaScript TypeScript HTML/CSS Bootstrap

Tools & Practices

Git Azure DevOps REST APIs Agile CI/CD
2024 — Present

Lead Umbraco Developer · Inchcape Baltic

Leading development of premium automotive dealer websites for BMW, Ford, Mazda, and Subaru brands. Architecting scalable Umbraco solutions with real-time inventory management, advanced vehicle configuration tools, and seamless third-party integrations.

Umbraco C# .NET Vue.js Azure SQL Server
2023 — 2024

Senior Umbraco Developer · Press Association

Executed critical platform migrations from Umbraco v7 to v13, modernizing legacy codebases and improving performance across multiple high-traffic websites. Implemented modern content workflows and enhanced editorial experiences.

Umbraco v13 C# .NET 8 Azure DevOps SQL Server
2022 — 2023

Umbraco Developer · Various Clients

Delivered comprehensive Umbraco migration projects for recruitment sector clients, upgrading platforms from v7 to v8. Enhanced job posting workflows, improved mobile responsiveness, and integrated with third-party recruitment APIs.

Umbraco v8 C# .NET Framework jQuery Bootstrap
View Full Resume
